summary: Experienced Business Development Manager with a track record of growing revenue, managing key accounts, and leading cross-functional financial operations across multiple locations. Skilled in sales, budgeting, forecasting, relationship building, and team leadership.

experience.title: Business Development Manager
experience.description: Manage new and existing accounts to maximize recurring revenues; provide value-driven service; generate new business via face-to-face meetings and phone; identify prospective clients; respond to inquiries promptly; perform high-volume outbound calls; complete documentation and maintain a database of contacts.

experience.title: Business Development Manager
experience.description: Manage new and existing accounts to maximize recurring revenues; provide value-driven service; generate new business via face-to-face meetings and phone; identify prospective clients; respond to inquiries promptly; perform high-volume outbound calls; complete documentation and maintain a database of contacts.

experience.title: Finance Director/Accounting Manager
experience.description: Guided finance staff, vendors, and Chapter personnel in day-to-day finance activities, including accounting, reporting, billing, credit card processing, collections, cash management, budgeting, forecasting, payroll, accounts payable, accounts receivable, and human resources for five office locations.

experience.title: Budget/Project Accountant
experience.description: Coordinated and led the annual budget process; developed and managed budget monitoring and evaluation systems; analyzed budget patterns and project expenditures; liaised with internal and external administrative offices to ensure compliance; provided instruction on budget procedures as a liaison between departments.

experience.title: Accountant
experience.description: Performed full spectrum of accounting functions, including audit testing and preparing tax returns; conducted monthly bookkeeping for numerous companies.

experience.title: Manager
experience.description: Directed staff in providing specialized cosmetic services; built long-term customer relationships; ensured customer satisfaction; provided educational support to salon staff.

experience.title: Merchantainment Cast Member/Intern
experience.description: Assisted in store-wide functions including customer service, sales counter/cashiering, stocking, merchandising, inventory control, loss prevention, and problem resolution; selected as one of 13 Colorado State University students for the internship.

experience.title: Telemarketing Agent
experience.description: Selected to be part of the initial outbound sales team; performed both inbound and outbound sales duties.

education.degree: Master of Organizational Leadership, Human Resources: Leadership
Master of Business Administration: Business Administration
Master of Business Administration, Degree Plus Program
